changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE PROFILE_SEQ AS BIGINT START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE CACHED TABLE PROFILE( ID BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS SEQUENCE PROFILE_SEQ PRIMARY KEY, NAME VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL UNIQUE, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(250))

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE CHECKED_HABIT_SEQ AS BIGINT START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE CACHED TABLE CHECKED_HABIT( ID BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS SEQUENCE CHECKED_HABIT_SEQ PRIMARY KEY, NAME VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL UNIQUE, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(250), PROFILE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CRON_EXPRESSION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(PROFILE_ID) REFERENCES PROFILE(ID))

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE MEASURED_HABIT_SEQ AS BIGINT START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE CACHED TABLE MEASURED_HABIT( ID BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS SEQUENCE MEASURED_HABIT_SEQ PRIMARY KEY, NAME VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL UNIQUE, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(250), PROFILE_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CRON_EXPRESSION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, DEADLINE TIMESTAMP, DEADLINE_VALUE DECIMAL(15,2), FOREIGN KEY(PROFILE_ID) REFERENCES PROFILE(ID))

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE CHECKED_HABIT_HISTORY_SEQ AS BIGINT START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE CACHED TABLE CHECKED_HABIT_HISTORY( ID BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS SEQUENCE CHECKED_HABIT_HISTORY_SEQ PRIMARY KEY, CHECKED_HABIT_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CHECK_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CHECK_FLAG BOOLEAN NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(CHECKED_HABIT_ID) REFERENCES CHECKED_HABIT(ID))

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE MEASURED_HABIT_HISTORY_SEQ AS BIGINT START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1

changeSet.author: KotovDV
changeSet.sql: CREATE CACHED TABLE MEASURED_HABIT_HISTORY( ID BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS SEQUENCE MEASURED_HABIT_HISTORY_SEQ PRIMARY KEY, MEASURED_HABIT_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CHECK_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, MEASURED_VALUE DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(MEASURED_HABIT_ID) REFERENCES MEASURED_HABIT(ID))
